text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Name one family out of millions of Americans affected by COVID-19  that you called and offered your condolences. Just One Stranger Donald
1,053,714 Cases 
119,321 Recovered 
60,823 Deaths, Zero Condolences.
Trump won't do anything to save you.
Save yourself Vote GOP out 2020
